content: I want together a group together in ABQ, NM to send out postcards. How can I get started?
Hi <@1274514980519018588>  -- You can search for postcard events here: https://events.democrats.org/

<@1274514980519018588>  If you are looking to organize people yourself, you can also do a Google Search for election postcards and a lot of different organizations should show up for both national and downballot races that will send you addresses and scripts. You could then sign up to host an event through the link above and make it public or private, depending on your preferences.
Also check out our <#1268426751164551199> thread here since people will post that there.
